T02D2968:46b-0: @46b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2968:46b-1: gdon stong phrag brgyad cu dang nad rnams las rnam
T02D2968:46b-2: par rgyal par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig
T02D2968:46b-3: dang ldan pas gnas khang yid dang mthun par mandal
T02D2968:46b-4: gyi steng du bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
T02D2968:46b-5: nang du / bum rkyen rnams rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2968:46b-6: de nas bdag nyid kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba sngar dang 'dra bar byas la /
T02D2968:46b-7: de nas h'um las byung ba'i khro bo padma mthar
T02D2968:46b-8: byed sku mdog dmar skya zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa
T02D2968:46b-9: / lcags kyu dang tho ba dang /
T02D2968:46b-14: mda' gzhu 'gengs pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2968:46b-15: h'um dang phat rgyun du sgrogs pa'i gzugs su byas
T02D2968:46b-16: te ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskul la
T02D2968:46b-17: / don gnyis byas la de nas bdag don du
T02D2968:46b-18: 'dod pa'i don legs pa gang yin pa bsgrubs te
T02D2968:46b-20: de nas bum pa'i nang du bstims te legs par nges pa'i 'dod don byas te /
T02D2968:46b-21: nyid kyi snying ga'i ye shes kyi rdo rje nas tsam la dmigs la /
T02D2968:46b-22: yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la gos dmar po dri ma med pa gyon te /
T02D2968:46b-23: aa 'bras kyi phye ma la bsngags te bum pa la bstim par bya'o //
T02D2968:46b-24: aom aa pra ti ha ta badzra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes stong phrag gnyis bzlas te /
T02D2968:46b-25: de nas 'od du zhu la ye shes kyi bdud
T02D2968:46b-26: rtsir dmigs la len bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D2968:46b-27: gam brgya rtsa brgyad du khrus chu nas bton na
T02D2968:46b-28: gang la las la sbyar ba de nyid gdon dang
T02D2968:46b-30: de dag gis ni rgyud du thams cad du ma
T02D2968:46b-31: 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis sgrub pa las
T02D2968:46b-33: rang rtags rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs bdun pa las
